channel.title: Infrastructure on Samuel Rincé
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on Samuel Rincé

item.title: Boavizta Workshops: Infra, Cloud and AI at Green Coding Summit
item.description: Benjamin Le Bigot and I participated the Green Coding Summit 2023 in Berlin to represent Boavizta. We gave two workshops on the core methodologies and tools developed by the non-profit.

item.title: Integrate ICT environmental impacts with BoaviztAPI
item.description: In this workshop hosted by Planet Tech’Care, we present BoaviztAPI, one of main the project at Boavizta. BoaviztAPI enables developers and organizations estimate the environmental impacts of IT resources such as servers, cloud instances and end-user devices. We explain how the bottom-up methodology is built and demostrate some use cases using the API.

item.title: Multicriteria impact assessment of ICT at Boavizta
item.description: A short presentation on the methodologies and tools that we develop at Boavizta. This presentation was done at GreenAI UPPA.
